alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ERIE...NIAGARA... ORLEANS AND NORTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Grand Island to Amherst to near Akron to near Byron to near Le Roy. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, Niagara Falls, North Tonawanda, Lockport, Batavia, Kenmore, Amherst, Tonawanda, Medina, Albion, Williamsville, Hamlin Beach State Park, Grand Island, Newfane, Pendleton, Le Roy, Pembroke, Akron, and Lewiston. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 47 and 48A, and between exits 50 and 50A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
